item.title: DjangoCon EU 2013: Andy McKay - Processing payments for the paranoid

Description

Videos from DjangoCon Europe 2013 are kindly provided by Heroku, a cloud application platform -- a new way of building and deploying web apps: http://heroku.com/

item.title: Fighting malnutrition with SMS and Django

Description

Case study about using sms and django on a project called rapidsms.
